org.apache.flink.api.common.state

接口 OperatorState<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the value in the operator state
    所有超级接口:
    State
    所有已知子接口:
    ValueState<T>
    已过时。 
    OperatorState has been replaced by ValueState.

    @Deprecated
 @PublicEvolving
public interface OperatorState<T>
extends State
    This state interface abstracts persistent key/value state in streaming programs. The state is accessed and modified by user functions, and checkpointed consistently by the system as part of the distributed snapshots.

    The state is only accessible by functions applied on a KeyedDataStream. The key is automatically supplied by the system, so the function always sees the value mapped to the key of the current element. That way, the system can handle stream and state partitioning consistently together.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void update(T value)
      已过时。 
      Updates the operator state accessible by value() to the given value.
      T value()
      已过时。 
      Returns the current value for the state.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State

        clear

    • 方法详细资料

      • value

        T value()
 throws IOException
        已过时。 
        Returns the current value for the state. When the state is not partitioned the returned value is the same for all inputs in a given operator instance. If state partitioning is applied, the value returned depends on the current operator input, as the operator maintains an independent state for each partition.
        返回:
        The operator state value corresponding to the current input.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown if the system cannot access the state.

      • update

        void update(T value)
     throws IOException
        已过时。 
        Updates the operator state accessible by value() to the given value. The next time value() is called (for the same state partition) the returned state will represent the updated value. When a partitioned state is updated with null, the state for the current key will be removed and the default value is returned on the next access.
        参数:
        value - The new value for the state.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown if the system cannot access the state.
